title: Drawing, "Bash-Bish Falls, South Egremont, Massachusetts", July 18, 1859
medium: Graphite, white chalk on grey wove paper.
inscribed: Inscribed and dated in graphite, lower right: Bash-Bish/July 18 59.
description: Vertical view with a group of four picnickers sitting in foreground on a rocky ledge before a pool of water and cascading waterfall. Jagged boulders, massive rocks and trees surround the falls. The location of this scene is Bish-Bash Falls, South Egremont, Massachusetts, situated in the Berkshire mountains.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Bash-Bish Falls, South Egremont, Massachusetts", July 18, 1859.
July 18, 1859. Graphite, white chalk on grey wove paper.. Bequest of Erskine Hewitt. 1942-50-202.
